/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A few cars can be seen in the distance, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in the natural light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
